A Shed

architecture
pine

As a summer project during the COVID-19 pandemic, I designed and built a minimalist modern shed, which is 8’ x 10’ with a slanted roof (8’ tall wall and 7’ short wall).

Video and Photos

I recorded the project using time lapse. The 5-minute video can be viewed at: Youtube and Meipai.

Side View

Front View:

Motorcycle Ramp:

Material List

I bought all materials from Home Depot (Note: I am not affiliated or compensated by Home Depot) and the list with price and links can be accessed at: Google Sheets, Excel, PDF.

References

I watched lots of videos on YouTube and the followings helped me the most:

  • How to build a shed by yourself
  • How to build a lean-to shed
  • How to build shed doors
